---
title: "Data Preparation"
---

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, readr, psych, st, stars, tmap)
```

```{r}
weather_list <- list.files(path = "data",
                           recursive = TRUE,
                           pattern = "\\.csv$",
                           full.names = TRUE)
list(weather_list)
```

```{r}
weather <- read_csv(weather_list)

weather <- weather %>%
  rename_with(~ gsub(" ", "_", .x), everything())

glimpse(weather)
```
